events.message: I have filed a claim for the car accident that occurred last night involving my vehicle and another car on Elm Street.
Your claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the details provided including descriptions of the collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case and will assist you throughout the claims process.
We have officially acknowledged your accident claim and started preparing for the next steps, including investigation.
Please submit all relevant documents including the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
All requested documents have been submitted by you, including police reports and damage assessments from the mechanic.
The investigation team has started reviewing the details of your auto accident claim to verify the circumstances.
The investigation on your vehicle collision claim is now complete, affirming the validity of the reported damages.
We have proposed a settlement amount based on the repair costs and liability determined during the investigation.
You have provided feedback expressing satisfaction with the settlement offer and the handling of your auto claim.
Your auto accident claim has been approved and we are moving forward with issuing the payment.
The payment for your car repairs following the auto accident has been issued to your preferred financial account.
Your auto accident claim case is now closed. Thank you for your cooperation during the entire process.
The documentation and records of your completed automobile accident claim have been securely archived for future reference.
